name: Rodent Riot
description:
2v2 Asymmetrical game where one team play as mice and have to get 6 cheese back to there base before the timer runs out. Whereas the exterminators have to stop the mice from getting the cheeses. Both teams have different abilities to add to their of odds of winning.

Note: UI can only be navigated with mouse and keyboard. However game play is intended for a controller. Hold Bottom face button on controller as mouse to climb.
